title: Virtual Multi-Way Switch
description: Creates a virtual multi-way switch configuration (3-way, 4-way, 5-way, etc.) where multiple switches/lights can control each other. When any switch changes state, all others will match that state.

group_entities.name: Select Switches/Lights
group_entities.description: Choose the switches or lights that should behave as a multi-way group.

exclude_from_sync.name: Exclude From Sync (Optional)
exclude_from_sync.description: Entities that should trigger the others but not be controlled by them (one-way control).

delay_seconds.name: Delay (Optional)
delay_seconds.description: Delay in seconds between state change and synchronization (to prevent loops).
